newsitem.title: GREECE: DELTA, NUNTIUS BROKERAGES BARRED FROM TRADE LATE MON.
newsitem.headline: DELTA, NUNTIUS BROKERAGES BARRED FROM TRADE LATE MON.

text.p: Athens stock exchange member firms Delta and Nuntius Securities were barred from trading late on Monday's session, about 15 minutes before the close for non-compliance with the clearing house on delivery of shares.
Sources at the bourse supervisor's office said both firms had their trading terminals on the floor of the exchange switched off.
Nuntius Managing Director Alexander Moraitakis told Reuters the problem which got sorted out after the close was caused by a delayed receival of shares from the clearing house.
He expected business as usual on Tuesday.
